---
title: "dynatop Training"
---

This course is split into two parts. The first part aims to:

- Provide an outline of Dynamic TOPMODEL as implemented in the `dynatop` and
  `dynatopGIS` packages
- Demonstrate the use the the packages with a hands on example

The second part of the course extend this building an more in depth knowledge
by:

- Look at the source code of `dynatop` by forking and cloning the software repository
- Show the process of altering and building the source code through a hands on example
